program.name: python -m ep_bolfi.kadi_tools.plot_measurement
program.description: Please refer to the --help output of this file.

param.description: File name as template for output files.
param.name: filename

param.description: Type of the measurement, which determines the internal format for further processing. 'cycling' refers to Cycling_Information, 'static' to Static_Information' and 'impedance' to Impedance_Information. If you are unsure which to pick, consult the package documentation.
param.name: datatype

param.description: Title of the plot. Defaults to the template file name.
param.name: title

param.description: Set to False if the current shall not be plotted.
param.name: plot_current

param.description: First segment to include in the plot.
param.name: start

param.description: Segment after the last one to include in the plot.
param.name: stop

param.description: Step between segments to include in the plot.
param.name: step

param.description: Whether or not an already existing file by the same name in the record gets overwritten.
param.name: overwrite

param.description: Toggle to display the plot on the machine this script runs on.
param.name: display
